code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{setMode}from'../reducers/codeReducer';import{Rnd}from'react-rnd';import CodeBox from'../components/CodeBox';import'../css/CodeBox.css';var CodeBoxContainer=function CodeBoxContainer(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var state=useSelector(function(state){return state;});var handleTabClick=function handleTabClick(mode){dispatch(setMode(mode));};useEffect(function(){var selectedColor="#263238";var deselectedColor="#162228";var htmlTab=document.querySelector(".html-btn");var cssTab=document.querySelector(".css-btn");var jsTab=document.querySelector(".js-btn");switch(state.code.mode){case"html":jsTab.style.backgroundColor=deselectedColor;htmlTab.style.backgroundColor=selectedColor;cssTab.style.backgroundColor=deselectedColor;break;case"css":jsTab.style.backgroundColor=deselectedColor;htmlTab.style.backgroundColor=deselectedColor;cssTab.style.backgroundColor=selectedColor;break;case"js":jsTab.style.backgroundColor=selectedColor;htmlTab.style.backgroundColor=deselectedColor;cssTab.style.backgroundColor=deselectedColor;break;default:break;};});return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Rnd,{className:"code-box-container",default:{height:400,x:50,y:window.innerHeight/3},bounds:".main-container",cancel:".code-box"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{className:"code-btn html-btn",onClick:function onClick(){return handleTabClick("html");}},"HTML"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{className:"code-btn css-btn",onClick:function onClick(){return handleTabClick("css");}},"CSS"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{className:"code-btn js-btn",onClick:function onClick(){return handleTabClick("js");}},"JavaScript"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CodeBox,null));};export default CodeBoxContainer;
